name: The Cyberspace Game
description:
The Cyberspace Game is a short adventure game inspired by Deus Ex. Escape the prison by hacking the computer, persuading NPCs, finding secret passages or fighting your way out.

This is a short game made for Brackeys Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-7

Credits: Tariri, Roughdragon, Karu.
